Structs/PersistenceModel.html.name: PersistenceModel
Structs/PersistenceModel.html.abstract: Structure used to define the schema of your CoreData model and it’s correlation to your Content Model

Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.name: create(type:)
Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.abstract: Create a new object of the given type.

Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.name: delete(type:predicate:)
Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.abstract: Delete objects of the given type which also match the predicate.

Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.name: fetchAll(type:predicate:)
Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.abstract: Fetches all objects of a specific type which also match the predicate.

Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.name: fetchOne(type:predicate:)
Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.abstract: Fetches one object of a specific type which matches the predicate.

Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.name: properties(for:)
Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.abstract: Returns an array of names of properties the given type stores persistently.

Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.name: relationships(for:)
Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.abstract: Returns an array of names of properties for any relationship the given type stores persistently.

Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.name: save()
Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.abstract: Performs the actual save to the persistence store.

Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.name: wipe()
Protocols/PersistenceStore.html#/s:21Con.abstract: Deletes all the data in the database

Protocols/EntryPersistable.html#/s:21Con.name: contentTypeId
Protocols/EntryPersistable.html#/s:21Con.abstract: The identifier of the Contentful content type that will map to this type of EntryPersistable

Protocols/EntryPersistable.html#/s:21Con.name: fieldMapping()
Protocols/EntryPersistable.html#/s:21Con.abstract: This method must be implemented to provide a custom mapping from Contentful fields to Swift properties.

Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.name: assetDescription
Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.abstract: The description of the asset. Named assetDescription to avoid clashing with description

Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.name: fileName
Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.abstract: The name of the underlying binary media file.

Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.name: fileType
Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.abstract: The type of the underlying binary media file: e.g. image/png

Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.name: size
Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.abstract: The byte size of the underlying binary media file.

Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.name: width
Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.abstract: If the binary media file is an image, this property describes the images width in pixels.

Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.name: height
Protocols/AssetPersistable.html#/s:21Con.abstract: If the binary media file is an image, this property describes the images height in pixels.

Protocols/ContentSysPersistable.html#/s:.name: localeCode
Protocols/ContentSysPersistable.html#/s:.abstract: The code which represents which locale the Resource of interest contains data for.

Protocols/ContentSysPersistable.html#/s:.name: updatedAt
Protocols/ContentSysPersistable.html#/s:.abstract: The date representing the last time the Contentful Resource was updated.

Protocols/ContentSysPersistable.html#/s:.name: createdAt
Protocols/ContentSysPersistable.html#/s:.abstract: The date that the Contentful Resource was first created.

Protocols/SyncSpacePersistable.html.name: SyncSpacePersistable
Protocols/SyncSpacePersistable.html.abstract: Your NSManagedObject subclass should conform to this SyncSpacePersistable to enable continuing

Protocols/AssetPersistable.html.abstract: Conform to AssetPersistable protocol to enable mapping of your Contentful media Assets to

Protocols/EntryPersistable.html.abstract: Conform to EntryPersistable protocol to enable mapping of your Contentful content type to

Enums/LocalizationScheme.html#/s:21Conte.name: default
Enums/LocalizationScheme.html#/s:21Conte.abstract: Use the .default scheme to save only for the default locale for your space.

Enums/LocalizationScheme.html#/s:21Conte.name: one(_:)
Enums/LocalizationScheme.html#/s:21Conte.abstract: Specify that data should be saved for only one locale using this scheme.

Enums/LocalizationScheme.html#/s:21Conte.name: all
Enums/LocalizationScheme.html#/s:21Conte.abstract: Require that data for all locales be saved to your persistent store. Remember to specify a

Enums/LocalizationScheme.html.name: LocalizationScheme
Enums/LocalizationScheme.html.abstract: Configure your SynchronizationManager instance with a localization scheme to define which data should

Classes/SynchronizationManager/DatabaseS.name: invalidFilePath
Classes/SynchronizationManager/DatabaseS.abstract: Thrown if there is not valid JSON stored in the directory the libarary is trying to seed

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: sync(limit:dbVersion:then:)
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: A wrapper method to synchronize data from Contentful to your local data store. The callback for this

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: client
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: The Contentful.Client that is configured to retrieve data from your Contentful space.

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: localizationScheme
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: The localization scheme with which to synchronize your Contentful space to your data store.

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: create(asset:)
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: This function is public as a side-effect of implementing PersistenceDelegate.

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: delete(assetWithId:)
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: This function is public as a side-effect of implementing PersistenceDelegate.

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: delete(entryWithId:)
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: This function is public as a side-effect of implementing SyncSpaceDelegate.

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: pendingRelationshipsURL
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: The local URL where unresolved relationships are cached so that they may be resolved on future app launches. Useful for debugging.

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: cachedUnresolvedRelationships
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: The unsresolved relationships that were cached to disk.

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: seedDBFromJSONFiles(in:in:)
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: This method will seed a CoreData datastore from a directory of JSON files in the specified Bundle.

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: pathInBundle(for:inDirectoryNamed:in:)
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: Returns the local path for media assets that have been bundled in your app’s bundle for the passed in Asset or AssetPersistable.

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: bundledData(for:inDirectoryNamed:in:)
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: Returns on-disk data that is bundled in your app’s bundle for the passed in Asset or AssetPersistable.

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.name: fileName(for:)
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html#/s:2.abstract: Returns a file name to be used for local storage given a passed in Asset or AssetPersistable.

Classes/SynchronizationManager/DatabaseS.name: DatabaseSeedingError
Classes/SynchronizationManager/DatabaseS.abstract: Errors thrown by ContentfulPersistence when trying to seed a database with bundled data.

Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.name: create(type:)
Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.abstract: Create a new object of the given type.

Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.name: delete(type:predicate:)

Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.name: fetchAll(type:predicate:)
Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.abstract: Fetches all objects of a specific type which also match the predicate.

Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.name: properties(for:)
Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.abstract: Returns an array of names of properties the given type stores persistently.

Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.name: relationships(for:)
Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.abstract: Returns an array of property names for any relationship the given type stores persistently.

Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.name: save()
Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.abstract: Performs the actual save to the persistence store.

Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.name: wipe()
Classes/CoreDataStore.html#/s:21Contentf.abstract: Remove persistence store and add a new one in its place

Classes/SynchronizationManager.html.name: SynchronizationManager
Classes/SynchronizationManager.html.abstract: Provides the ability to sync content from Contentful to a persistence store.
